name: Butler The Cat
description:
Story

I am Butler. The other cats are Butler, too. We are all Butler. All cats are Butler.

But you control only one of us. The Butler you control must eat the cheese. The Butler you control randomly changes each time you eat the cheese.

Credits

Programming, Design, 2D Art: Ahmet Kamil Keles

Music & SFX: Joe Janicki

Special thanks to This Cat is "Butler" Facebook group, which is the inspiration of this jam game
